articles.title: Malaysian govt now has to gather evidence after Leissner's testimony on 1MDB, says deputy minister - The Star Online

articles.author: Focus Taiwan - CNA English News
articles.title: Taiwan loses third straight in basketball World Cup qualifiers - Focus Taiwan News Channel
articles.description: Taipei, Feb. 28 (CNA) Taiwan went down to its third straight defeat in the Asian qualifiers for the 2023 FIBA Basketball World Cup on Monday, losing to Australia 90-71 despite another strong performance by its newly naturalized player.

articles.title: Passengers turning aggressive? Here's what bus captains should do, says Iswaran - AsiaOne
articles.description: Last November, a bus captain was punched and kicked by two intoxicated commuters who were upset that the former had told them to put on their masks properly. The bus captain's nose was broken during that vicious attack. The incident was raised in Parliament o…
